sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: The addpath routine adds a set of directories to the current path. The first form takes a single directory and adds it to the beginning or top of the path: addpath('directory') The second form add several directories to the top of the path: addpath('dir1','dir2',...,'dirn') Finally, you can provide a flag to control where the directories get added to the path addpath('dir1','dir2',...,'dirn','-flag') where if flag is either '-0' or '-begin', the directories are added to the top of the path, and if the flag is either '-1' or '-end' the directories are added to the bottom (or end) of the path.
